name: Gitane DeMone
description: '''Gitane DeMone''' (also spelled '''Demone''') is an American singer, musician and visual artist. Her career spans more than 30 years. She came to prominence in the mid-1980s as the keyboardist and backing vocalist of the influential [[death rock]] band [[Christian Death]]. In addition to her work with Christian Death, Demone was previously a member of [[Pompeii 99]], worked with [[Dreadful Shadows]], and has had a solo career which has included three studio albums: ''Am I Wrong?'', ''Stars of Trash'' and ''The Reflecting Shadow''.
